description:
Horizontal stripes of various types and colors of threads, alternating between densely woven and open weave. 2 gold warp.  Drk & Lt gold, olive, black, metallic gold weft.  Plain weave variation. Stapled to 8.25 x 11" card with 99.1.1180.5 
"H-2" printed on face of card. Larsen descriptive notes stapled to reverse. (golds, black, metallic gold)
